message:
You don't even have to install python you can jump right in here: http://www.jitouch.com/pycloud/

This text book is great to get started!:
http://learnpythonthehardway.org/book/ex1.html
Awesome, an IDE in the browser! Thanks Elena for the share! :D
Isn't it awesome! apparently it was on hackernews today :) I heard about it from one of the guys on the #pyladies irc channel :)
